title: Missing Agree To Terms Of Service During Installation?
body:
bought a new computer and was trying to install the latest league client

but I have not seen the "agree to terms of service" option anywhere

its on the very first step of installation (the same page where it asks you to choose the folder where it would be installed)

is it a bug or something?

replies.body: Mmmm I believe you agree to the ToU during account creation and each time the client patches. It's possible it used to be in the installation process and might have moved places, it's honestly been quite awhile since I've installed League. You can always view the ToU in the client settings under TOU though!
